Since the phenological observations covered the years 1958 to 2012 for CGI and 1977 to 2014 for LEY, but temperature recordings only started in 1998 and 2003, respectively, daily mean temperatures from 1957 to 2015 for CGI were calculated based on two linear regressions: The first one, Eq. 1, covers the timespan from 1978 to 1997 and uses data from the Meteoswiss stations in Pully (PUY) and Geneva (GVE). The second regression, Eq. 2, only uses the MeteoSwiss data from GVE as input variables to reconstruct temperatures from 1957 to 1977. The years 1998 to 2015 were covered by the Agrometeo recordings in CGI.
